name: backend
description: 1. Run npm install  2. Run npm install google-auth-library 3. Run npm install nodemailer 4. Create a .env file with following details :  GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID=Your_google_client_id MONGODB_URI='Your_mongoDB_Atlas_databse_link' senderMail=Your_sender_mail_id senderPassword=Your_sender_mail_password
